```{bash}
# Human Reference Genome Download and Indexing

# The reference genome used in my paper, hg19, can be downloaded from this link: 

# Software requirements
# BWA (https://github.com/lh3/bwa)
# samtools (http://www.htslib.org/download/)

# Variables
read 'reference_genome_name'
read 'reference_genome_link'

# Downloading the reference genome
mkdir reference_genome
wget -O <reference_genome_name> -P reference_genome/ <reference_genome_link>

# Indexing the reference genome using bwa and samtools
bwa index reference_genome/<reference_genome_name>
samtools faidx reference_genome/<reference_genome_name>
```
